Man likely to lose more of family home after second relationship ends, despite legal ‘protection’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-likely-to-lose-more-of-family-home-after-second-relationship-ends-despite-legal-protection/EOYDTVU22ZF3VANWAE3L7JUYIE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/man-likely-to-lose-more-of-family-home-after-second-relationship-ends-despite-legal-protection/EOYDTVU22ZF3VANWAE3L7JUYIE/ Tracy NealHe was wrong to think his actions would safeguard home from any claim by a future partner. Sat, 14 Sep 2024 18:07:00 +0000 A court has found a man put his family home in a trust to prevent his new partner from being able to claim a share of it if the relationship ended. They separated after 10 years together. Photo / 123rf
